summary: This is a brief email from an unidentified sender to Geoffrey Berman (US Attorney for the Southern District of New York) and others, noting that CNN has asked to confirm Jeffrey Epstein's arrest. The email states CNN has not inquired about any defense counsel narrative.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: US Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Addressee of an email regarding CNN's inquiry about Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.

events.title: CNN inquiry about Epstein arrest
events.description: CNN contacted an unidentified individual to confirm Jeffrey Epstein's arrest, but did not ask about any narrative or spin from defense counsel.

keyFacts: An email was sent on July 6, 2019, regarding media inquiry about Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.
CNN asked to confirm Epstein's arrest but had not asked about defense counsel's narrative.
The email was sent to US Attorney Geoffrey Berman and several other recipients at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
